title: Wafers. Rolled

thinly verted dripping with a broad, pan. long-bladed Crease knife three-inch on a buttered in-
instructions: Cream the butter, add sugar gradually, and milk drop
by drop; then add flour and flavoring. Spread very
bake in a slow oven until delicately browned. Place pan
